Description.Text: Hampton by Hilton Barranquilla is a modern 4-star hotel offering stylish accommodation near the heart of Barranquilla. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, a gym and a 24-hour shop. Barranquilla is a cosmopolitan and industrial port city situated alongside the Magdalena river. Nearby places of interest include the Centro historico, the paseo de Bolivar and the Monumento a la Bandera. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Barranquilla destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with a light-coloured facade. Facilities include a gym. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are approximately 22sqm and decorated in a sophisticated style with earth tones and contemporary artwork. Amenities include tea and coffee equipment, a flat-screen cable/satellite TV, safe and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. The 24-hour shop offers convenient snacks and drinks. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
